title: Bug 3622 - New Package Wizard has confusing message (1GD0L9O)
description: Bug 3622 - New Package Wizard has confusing message (1GD0L9O)
OB: When invoking the New Java Package wizard, the following message appears at the top: 'A folder corresponding to the package name already exists'. This message is displayed even when the package name field is empty.
EB: The New Java Package wizard should not display any error or warning messages when the package name field is empty. The wizard should allow creating a default package without any user input.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Create a new Java Project.
2. Select the project.
3. Invoke the New Java Package wizard.
